concept.title: Determining Pre- or Post-Operation Authorization
concept.shortdesc: The OperationContext object that is passed to the authorizeOperation method of the callback as the second argument provides an isPostOperation method that returns true when the callback is invoked in the post-operation phase.

conbody.p: If an authorization failure occurs in a pre-operation or post-operation callback on the server, the operation throws a NotAuthorizedException on the client.
